Здравейте,

 

Моля, за издаване на фактура на PPC с падеж 29.11.2024

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД    



                                                              

 

From: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, November 26, 2024 10:44 AM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>
Subject: PPC Invoice 22-25Nov 2024 Draft

 

Dear colleagues, 

 

Attached below is the draft invoice for ppc, covering 22-25 Nov. Please proceed with the issuance.
